title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(libminer)  lib_summary() #>                                                                                         Library #> 1                         /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-x86_64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/j2/63xz860d3_90w9q1rg4066gw0000gp/T/RtmpIPEHnY/temp_libpath170ba2fd668f0 #>   n_packages #> 1        126 #> 2          1  # Also can caluclate sizes lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                                         Library #> 1                         /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-x86_64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/j2/63xz860d3_90w9q1rg4066gw0000gp/T/RtmpIPEHnY/temp_libpath170ba2fd668f0 #>   n_packages   libsize #> 1        126 326152113 #> 2          1     14472

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provide brief summary package libraries machine

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes Boolean indicate library sizes required. Default FALSE.
